tpk::Transform

tpk::Transform Class Reference

#include <Transform.h>

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Instrument to focal plane transformation.

A Transform object transforms points in one 2D coordinate system to another and vice-versa. They are used to transform instrument or guider coordinates to the focal plane (the forward transformation) and back (the backward transformation).

The base class implements the identity transformation.

Attention:
All classes derived from this class must implement the clone method.
All the methods of this class are thread safe.
